author: jvanzyl
msg: Taking the gump descriptors and 'normalizing' them. Each project descriptors
contains all its own information. The 'ant convert' target will create
maven descriptors for all the gump descriptors and split out the nested
projects and merge the cvs information in the repository descriptors
into the project descriptors.

author: jvanzyl
msg: All the dvsl that must be part of the generated build:
gump/
dvsl to make a gump descriptor
xdocs/
dvsl used to transform the xml into the site
